data.title: Who has Erica Kane been married to on All My Children?
data.meta_description: Erica Kane has been married to: Jeff Martin (1971 to 1974; divorced)Philip Brent (1976; divorced)Tom Cudahy (1981; annulled)Adam Chandler (1984 to 1993; divorced)Mike Roy (1987; invalid)Travis Montgomery (1988; invalid)Travis Montgomery (1991; invalid)Adam Chandler (1993; vow renewal)Dimitri Marick (1994 to 1995; divorced)Dimitri Marick (1996 to 1999; divorced)Jackson Montgomery (Married: May 24th, 2005; Divorced: Aug 16th, 2007)
data.text:
Who is Rakim's wife?

Her name is Felicia. They were High School sweethearts. They have been married a while and have several children.

What did Romeo and Juliets do because their parents wouldn't let them get married?

Actually, Romeo and Juliet's parents did nothing to prevent their children from getting married. They may well have done so had they been asked, but they were never asked. The news that they had been married came as a total surprise to their parents after their deaths. Romeo and Juliet got married secretly because they assumed that their parents would object.
